entries.name: Hymn of the shield
entries.properties: Target gains +1 armor and +1 magic resist until the end of the measure.

entries.name: Hymn of the sword
entries.properties: Target gains +1 DMG to all attacks until the end of the measure.

entries.name: Legato
entries.properties:
At the start of the measure, +1 to all beat effects that are numerical and that positively affect the target.
This effect lasts until the end of the measure.

entries.name: Staccato
entries.properties:
At the start of the measure, +1 to all beat effects that are numerical and that negatively affect the target.
This effect lasts until the end of the measure.

entries.name: Attuned wisdom
entries.properties:
Automatically gained when WIS >= 5
Add 3 skill points among any skills.

entries.name: Half run
entries.properties: May move 20 feet on level ground and 10 feet on difficult terrain.

entries.name: Dimvision
entries.properties: See into dim light as if it were day.

entries.name: Song of the weave
entries.properties:
At the start of the next turn, you begin a song. A song can last for as long as it is played or sung. The song can be accompanied with a Motif and is set to a abilityTime signature.
The song is played with one beat equaling one turn. A beat is an ability that can only be performed during a song. Beats have one of four types:
  • Sharp
  • Flat
  • Natural
  • Rest
Beats are played in a Measure, depending on the abilityTime signature. Certain beats can only be played if they follow a particular beat type, or fall at a particular point in the measure.
A measure is a pattern of a particular number of beats, determined by the chosen abilityTime signature for the song. For example, if a 4/4 measure is chosen, every four beats the measure starts over. The song needs to be carefully considered to ensure it maintains proper rhythm and theme. Playing the right beats in sequence can provide bonuses. If a beat is not played on a turn, the turn is considered a Rest. If two rests are played in sequence, the song is ended early.
If a song is ended early, you must use abilityTemperament to begin the next song. Certain Composition dynamics like abilityOutro can end a song properly instead of early. If a song is ended properly, the next song can begin by using this ability.

entries.name: Time signature
entries.properties:
The time signature determines how many beats are in a measure. A measure starts over after the last beat in the measure. Certain time signatures are gained at certain levels:
  • At level 1 gain the 4/4 measure: 4 beats per measure
  • At level 1 gain the 4/4 measure: 4 beats per measure
  • At level 4 gain the 3/4 measure: 3 beats per measure
  • At level 10 gain the 2/4 measure: 2 beats per measure
  • At level 14 gain the 6/8 measure: 6 beats per measure
Once a time signature is chosen for the song, it cannot be changed.

entries.name: Temperament
entries.properties: Take two whole turns preparing for the next song by retuning your instrument or relaxing your vocal chords. After Temperament, abilitySong of the weave can be performed again. Temperament is only performed when required (see abilitySong of the weave for more details).

entries.name: Outro
entries.properties: Can only be activated during the last beat of the measure.  If activated, the next measure will be the last measure of the song, and the song will end properly.

entries.name: Capriccio
entries.properties:
A quick, improvisational, spirited composition.
All allies within the song's range gain abilityExtra move. Any ally that already has abilityExtra move gains abilityExtra move II instead. All allies also gain +2 to skillAthletic checks.

entries.name: Accompaniment
entries.properties: +2 to DMG or healing to beats if playing a two-handed instrument during a song.

entries.name: Grazioso
entries.properties:
A gracefully composition.
All allies within the song's range gain +1 AR. All allies also gain +2 to skillBalance checks.

entries.name: Soundwave
entries.properties:
+1 AR for every preceding beat in the measure.
+2 DMG if following a Rest.

entries.name: Healing words
entries.properties: +3 healing if the 3rd beat in the measure.

entries.name: Unarmed attack
entries.properties: AR -5

entries.name: Throw
entries.properties: Typical attack to throw a throwable weapon at a target. AR is DEX modified.  See weapon for range and damage.

entries.name: Fire
entries.properties: Typical attack to fire a ranged weapon. AR is DEX modified. See weapon for range and damage.

entries.name: Reload
entries.properties: Reload a ranged weapon. See weapon for action points needed to reload.

entries.name: Equip item
entries.properties:
Equip an item per free hand from your side or back.
For example, if you carry several javalins and you throw one, another must be equipped before use.

entries.name: Melee attack
entries.properties: Typical attack at a target with any melee weapon.  See weapon for damage.

entries.name: Dodge
entries.properties: Add dodge to armor and magic resist during AD.

entries.name: Move
entries.properties: May move 5 feet on level ground.  Difficult terrain takes 2 action points.

entries.name: Run
entries.properties: May move 30 feet on level ground and 15 feet on difficult terrain.

entries.name: Climb
entries.properties: With a successful skillAthletics check, may climb 5 feet on reasonably climbable surfaces such as trees or cliffs.

entries.name: Jump
entries.properties:
Jump forward 5 ft or upward 3 ft while standing still; jump forward 8 ft or upward 4 ft while running.
This is for a medium creature. For every creature size large, double amount. For every creature size smaller, half amount.

entries.name: Shout command
entries.properties:
May shout up to four words as a command. Make a skillPersuasion check as needed.
Response is only possible on target's turn.

entries.name: Ask question
entries.properties: May make a one sentence inquiry to a nearby target and they may respond in one sentence. Make any check as needed.

entries.name: Use cover
entries.properties:
Requires you to be in range to full or half cover.
If maneuvering while under cover is needed to attack (e.g. going from a crouch to a stand, or spinning around a column), 1 action point is needed to get out of cover, and one to get back in cover.

entries.name: Drink
entries.properties:
Can drink or administer (to a willing target) a vial of liquid.
If target is unconscious, requires a skillSleight of hand check > 13, otherwise the liquid is not swallowed.

entries.name: Stabilize
entries.properties: Provides one death save to an unconscious target.

entries.name: Improvise
entries.properties: Explain to the DM what you want to do, and allow him to decide how and if it can be done.  Expect checks and actions to be required.

entries.name: Disengage
entries.properties:
May move without enabling an abilityOpportunity attack.
No attack action can be made on the same turn.

entries.name: Hide
entries.properties:
Must be out of the line of sight of all opponents.
Allows a skillStealth check to be made. See skillStealth for more information.

entries.name: Search
entries.properties:
Requires you to be in range to the space being searched.
Search a space for one of the following:
  • General items of interest.
  • Make an skillInspection check to search for a hidden items.
  • Make an skillInspection check to search for specified clues.
  • Make an skillInspection check to search for hidden traps.
  • Make an skillInspection check to search for hidden compartments or doors.

entries.name: Ready
entries.properties:
You may make an action, costing <= 3 action points, on any other character's turn. You may make the action in between actions of a character, but must declare you are doing so before the character begins the action.
If you perform a reaction, you lose your chance to make this special action.

entries.name: Opportunity attack
entries.properties: If an enemy that was once within reach, performs a move action to be out of reach, you may make a free melee attack against that enemy, costing <= half (round up) of your action points (at least 3).

entries.name: Grapple
entries.saving throw: T: STR ST >= A: STR check
entries.properties:
On hit, you may move the target as if slowed, and the target cannot attack.
+5 STR check for each size smaller the target is; -5 STR check for each size larger the target is.
If humanoid, you cannot perform any action that requires your hands while grappling.

entries.name: Shove
entries.saving throw: T: STR ST >= A: STR check
entries.properties:
On hit, you move the target 5 ft away.
If your STR check >= target's STR ST + 5, you move the target 10 ft away and the target is knocked prone.
+5 STR check for each size smaller the target is; -5 STR check for each size larger the target is.

entries.name: Delay
entries.properties:
For the encounter, moves your turn after the next character's turn.
This may be repeated until you reach the bottom of the initiative order

entries.name: Hilt butt
entries.properties:
Gained when a hilted weapon is equipped.
Hit target with butt end of hilt for 2 bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Block
entries.properties: Gained if armor indicates abilityBlock is possible. If dodge is negative, before adding the block's dodge modifier, set the dodge to 0. Add dodge to armor and magic resist during AD.
